* Iron Raptor's optics widened in shock as she saw the detination charges in which Tigerhawk held, her spark almost stopping as she heard his words.
It was unbelievable that Tigerhawk seemed to see that the only way out was either resquing them or killing them all!
Her mouth dropped open a bit and she strained against the grip on her neck, actually getting loose and taking a few steps away from her captor.
Then she glared at Tigerhawk and shook her head.*

" What in the Pit do you think you're doing?!! You're PLANNING to kill us all? It's insane, Tigerhawk!! It's not worth the cost!"
